jcr:content.jcr:description: The legendary Altra 10th Anniversary Lone Peak includes detailing and colorways inspired by the original trail icon. Enjoy this trail running throwback!
jcr:content.jcr:title: Altra Lone Peak 10 Year Anniversary Shoes

video.description: 360 rotation of the original Lone Peak and the 10th Anniversary edition
video.name: 360 rotation of the original Lone Peak and the 10th Anniversary edition

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: It's been a decade since the Lone Peak first summited the Wasatch Mountains and introduced Altra Running to the world. Now celebrating the brand’s 10th anniversary, the legend returns with detailing, colorways inspired by the original men’s and women’s versions of the trail icon, and throwback upper materials.

image.alt: Outside shot of the Men's Altra Lone Peak 10th Anniversary shoe.
Outside shot of the Women's Altra Lone Peak 10th Anniversary shoe.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
THE LEGENDARY LONE PEAK IS BORN

Altra Running was founded on an innovative approach to running shoes. An approach that has kept us going for a decade and aims to keep you running for a lifetime. An approach that ultimately inspired the legendary Lone Peak and continues to inspire every single Altra Running shoe.

video.description: The history behind the Altra Lone Peak shoe.
video.name: The history behind the Altra Lone Peak shoe.

customhtml2_copy_cop_252965106.customHTML:
INSPIRED BY THE ORIGINAL

Detailing, colorways, and throwback upper materials inspired by the original Altra Lone Peak.

image.alt: Toe shot of the Altra Lone Peak 10-year Anniversary shoe

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
THROWBACK MESH UPPER

Inspired by a 100-mile race, the limited-edition model uses a similar breathable mesh upper to the original from ten years ago. (Need the more durable, long- distance, do-it-all trail shoe? Check out the Lone Peak 5.)

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
THEN vs NOW
The Anniversary Lone Peak shoe pays homage to the original Lone Peak through its throwback upper materials and rugged adventurous spirit.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
THE LONE PEAK LEGACY:
IT RUNS IN THE FAMILY

The iconic trail runner has come a long way since its debut 10 years ago. Today, we celebrate the shoe that started it all as it continues to evolve and expand, offering options for anyone and everyone willing to explore anywhere and everywhere.

image.alt: All of the shoes in the Lone Peak family, clockwise from top left: Lone Peak 5, Lone Peak Hiker, Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Low, Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Mid, Lone Peak Kids'.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
"

It was mile 97 and I look back, no blisters. My hamstring injury I’d been struggling with —nothing. And I finished over three hours faster.

- Brian Beckstead, 2011, on running the Wasatch 100 in the original Lone Peak prototype
Co-founder, Altra Running

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
GIFT WITH PURCHASE

GET A POSTER WITH EVERY PAIR


Ten years ago, the first ever Lone Peak conquered the fabled Wasatch Front 100 Mile Endurance Run. To celebrate a decade of innovation, we're giving away a limited-edition Wasatch 100-inspired poster with the purchase of any Lone Peak shoe on altrarunning.com between August 22 and September 12.*

*While supplies last. Valid in the US only. See full terms.

image.alt: Hand-drawn map of the Wasatch Front 100 Endurance Race
Picture of a man and woman running through a wooded area in the Altra Lone Peak 10 Year Anniversary shoes.

customhtml2.customHTML:
ALTRA FOOTSHAPE™ COMFORT

Our signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet.

image.alt: Vertical top shot of the Men's Altra Lone Peak 10th Anniversary shoe.
Vertical top shot of the Women's Altra Lone Peak 10th Anniversary shoe.
